name: Name
introduction_content: The Heritages API is organized around REST. Our API has predictable resource-oriented URLs, accepts form-encoded request bodies, returns JSON-encoded responses, and uses standard HTTP response codes, authentication, and verbs.
heritage_api_query_params_information: This is the API for retrieve the world heritages information. You can pass below params to filter the return result.
heritage_api_response: The following elements are the attribute returned in the Heritages API response
